generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and a manhole cover, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- building: Multiple multi-story residential buildings are visible in the background and on the sides of the road.
- vegetation: Several trees with visible branches and leaves are present along the road and in front of the buildings.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen standing on the sidewalk on the far right side of the image.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a black Mercedes-Benz and a dark blue Renault.
- bus: A white and blue bus is partially visible on the left side of the image.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the left side of the image, above the bus.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic light and streetlights.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign (likely indicating a bicycle route) is visible on the right side of the image.
